reply.content: Pls mail us at kjsk.developers@gmail.com and we will assist you how to install the app on the phone as well as on the wear.

author: Grace Lisch
comment: I would definitely give it a 5, and will, except their digital watch leaves a bit to be desired. I prefer digital, as watch hands are not always easy to see in a fast paced work environment. I love that you can change the font and time position, however, I wish you could change the color of the writing, as white doesn't show on all faces. Additionally wish you could change font size to bigger or smaller. Also, top and bottom positioning are VERY top and bottom, which doesn't look great on a round face watch.

reply.author: KJSK Developers
reply.content:
Thanks Grace for your feedback
We will surely take your feedback in our next release

author: Don Gillespie
comment: Great app for my smart watch. Only one thing stops me from giving a 5. It uses wifi only to transfer watch faces automatically. I would expect it to switch to Bluetooth when no wifi but instead the watch faces just stop changing until I get a wifi signal again. This should be fixed. There's no reason not to use Bluetooth.

author: Ant Kele
comment: Very basic. I had problems tranfering watchfaces to my watch, was not worth the effort. Now uninstalled, there are alot better watch face apps out there.

reply.author: KJSK Developers
reply.content:
Dear User,
You have to install application in two parts
1) Install 1000+ Watch faces in your android devices from google play store
2) Install 1000+ Watch face in your LG URBANE (if wear 2.0 installed)  from google wear store in your wear

Android tablet/device will automatically sync with your wear

author: Jennifer Rivas
comment: Not sure how to use this app seems to be my problem. Once it downloads it just sticks to 1 of the many themes. It doesn't download all of them. So I'm not sure if this is the apps fault or I'm not doing something right.

reply.author: KJSK Developers
reply.content:
Dear User
You have to download companion also in your android device
Just go to Play Store and search for 1000+ Watch Face 
Select the watch face 1000+ Watch face in your android wear and with help of companion  app in android device you can change themes and setings

title: Not bad at all .

author: Dan Valdez
comment: Can't figure out how to get the designed watch face to transfer to from my phone to the watch.  Bummer. I liked all the options.

author: Jo Anne Degener
comment: LOVE this app!  It's exactly what I was looking for!  Others have mentioned seeing lots of ads, but that hasn't been my experience at all.  The watch faces are beautiful, bright and colorful, with lots of categories to choose from. I noticed in the update that we now have the ability to add other functions to the watch face, like battery level, weather, etc., but I haven't been able to figure out how to do that.   Otherwise,, the app is perfect for me, my ZenWatch 3 smart watch and my OnePlus 3 smart phone! Thanks!  Update:  I emailed the app developer and got an answer right away, on how to add the additional functions to my watch face.  It only works with Android Wear 2.0, which I have.  (Swipe left to see watch faces, when you see 1000+ Watch Face, there is a gear icon at bottom.  Press this and you'll see a preview of watch face with two + signs.  Press each on and select option you want for that icon from the list.)  BINGO!  It works!  Perfect app for my needs!  Highly recommend!

reply.author: KJSK Developers
reply.content:
Hi Jo,
Thanks for your review
Its really good to hear you like the app
Please feel free to contact us anytime if you face any difficulty,will be happy to help

reply.author: KJSK Developers
reply.content:
Dear user
If you have wear 2.0 you can add various options
Just go to 1000+ watch face settings in your android wear (swipe right in your android wear and select settings ,small gear under 1000+ watch face )
In settings page you can select any option like steps battery and many more
